name: React Performance Talk
description: Slides for a tech talk presentation I did at Rent, going over some basics of Interaction to Next Paint and strategies on improving React performance with Transitions and thread yielding techniques.

name: freeCodeCamp Oklahoma
description: Community organizer for FreeCodeCamp Oklahoma, coordinating meetups and delivering technical talks. Focus on facilitating networking between local professionals and providing mentoring opportunities for new programmers.

name: Framework Matcher
description: A small game made with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to experiment with using transforms. Flip the cards to find matching pairs.

name: Pomodoro Timer
description: A simple pomodoro timer for working and taking breaks. Made with React, TypeScript, and styled components.
